I bought these in 4 colors: black, white, light coffee, and heather grey. They are all form fitting, flattering, and feel nice and soft (athletic material), but are so THIN that I can't even wear a nude colored bra in the white one without it showing through BAD. These will definitely not keep you warm, either. The light coffee color one isn't quite as sheer as the white, but still bad enough for me to return it (it was also basically my exact skin color which did not look flattering). The black and grey don't have the same problem with showing bras through them, but are of course still very thin. They look pretty nice and I would keep them if they weren't so sheer. I can't think of a way I could make the white one work in public.
